message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split to start.
Let's try 55/45, considering the inflation, it's a better deal for you than it looks
How about we meet in the middle? This accounts for the inflation a bit.
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think 58/42 is a fair split now
This is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
You're losing value every round, I think 60/40 is more than fair now
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Accept this offer or I'm going to start being unreasonable.
You're running out of time and value, 62/38 is my best offer yet
Fine, Bob. You win.  Take it.
